text: @CyrilRamaphosa Mo ga o sanya go bolela lerena xem. Ke lekile go bala efela akekwe selo. Mr president may the leaving God protect and guide you through this hard time. As a father of the nation. People don't know gore o nyaka di thape go fenya coronavirus.
